Package cs2030.simulator

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2030.simulator.Servicer
      • cs2030.simulator.Server
  • class Server
extends Servicer
    The Server class keeps track of who is the customer waiting to be served (if any).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.Queue<WaitEvent> waitingCustomers
      Customers who are currently queuing to be served by a given server, if any.
